page.title: 14Games children play,Earlston
page.content: Children in the area play various team games,board games and individual games. {Team games- Netball}is a game played by seven people and the ball is passed by hands.{Football}is played by five or eleven people and the ball is passed by feet.{Rounders}is played by about ten people in each team.You hit the ball as far as you can then you run round some markers. {Board games- monopoly-}In monopoly you get money at the start and you have to go round a board and you have to buy some property.{Othello-}Othello is a game played with black and white counters. {Individual-Badminton and tennis}are very similar. The only difference is that in tennis you use a ball and badminton you use a shuttle cock.
